Uses of Class
sage.scene.bounding.BoundingVolume

  • Packages that use BoundingVolume 
    Package Description
    sage.camera  
    sage.scene  
    sage.scene.bounding  
    sage.terrain  

    • Uses of BoundingVolume in sage.camera

      Methods in sage.camera with parameters of type BoundingVolume 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean JOGLCamera.intersects(BoundingVolume bv) 
      boolean ICamera.intersects(BoundingVolume bv)
      Returns true if the specified BoundingVolume intersects the current camera view frustum.
      boolean AbstractCamera.intersects(BoundingVolume bv)
      This method is intended to be overridden by camera implementation subclasses in a way that returns a boolean indicating whether the specified BoundingVolume intersects the currently-defined camera view volume.

    • Uses of BoundingVolume in sage.scene

      Fields in sage.scene declared as BoundingVolume 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected BoundingVolume Leaf.localBound
      Holds the local-space BoundingVolume for the Leaf; that is, a BoundingVolume defined in local coordinates.
      protected BoundingVolume SceneNode.worldBound
      The BoundingVolume of this SceneNode, given in world coordinates.
      Methods in sage.scene that return BoundingVolume 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BoundingVolume Leaf.getLocalBound()
      getLocalBound() returns the local BoundingVolume object for this Leaf.
      BoundingVolume SceneNode.getWorldBound()
      Returns the Bounding Volume in world space for this SceneNode.
      Methods in sage.scene with parameters of type BoundingVolume 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void SceneNode.setLocalBound(BoundingVolume bv)
      Sets the local bounding volume for this node to the specified BV.
      void Leaf.setLocalBound(BoundingVolume bv)
      setLocalBound() sets the local bounding volume of this Leaf to the specified BoundingVolume.
      void Group.setLocalBound(BoundingVolume bv)
      Sets the "local bound" of this Group by telling all children to set their "local bound" to the specified BV.

    • Uses of BoundingVolume in sage.scene.bounding

      Subclasses of BoundingVolume in sage.scene.bounding 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BoundingBox
      This class defines a BoundingVolume which is an axis-aligned bounding box (AABB).
      class  BoundingSphere
      This class defines a BoundingVolume which is a sphere.
      Methods in sage.scene.bounding that return BoundingVolume 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract BoundingVolume BoundingVolume.computeFromPoints(java.nio.FloatBuffer vertices)
      Updates this BoundingVolume by computing a new defintion of the BoundingVolume's data based on the specified set of vertices.
      BoundingVolume BoundingSphere.computeFromPoints(java.nio.FloatBuffer vertices) 
      BoundingVolume BoundingBox.computeFromPoints(java.nio.FloatBuffer vertices) 
      abstract BoundingVolume BoundingVolume.merge(BoundingVolume otherBV)
      Returns a new BoundingVolume which is the merge of this BoundingVolume and the specified BoundingVolume.
      BoundingVolume BoundingSphere.merge(BoundingVolume otherBV)
      Returns a BoundingVolume which surrounds both this BoundingSphere and the specified BoundingVolume.
      BoundingVolume BoundingBox.merge(BoundingVolume otherBV)
      Returns a BoundingVolume which surrounds both this BoundingBox and the specified BoundingVolume.
      abstract BoundingVolume BoundingVolume.transformBy(graphicslib3D.Matrix3D mat, double[] scaleValues)
      Transforms the center of this BoundingVolume by the specified Matrix3D transformation.
      BoundingVolume BoundingSphere.transformBy(graphicslib3D.Matrix3D mat, double[] scaleValues)
      Applies the specified transformation to the center point (location) of this BoundingSphere.
      BoundingVolume BoundingBox.transformBy(graphicslib3D.Matrix3D mat, double[] scaleValues)
      Applies the specified transformation to the center point (location) of this BoundingBox.
      Methods in sage.scene.bounding with parameters of type BoundingVolume 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract boolean BoundingVolume.intersects(BoundingVolume otherBV)
      Returns true if this BoundingVolume intersects the specified BoundingVolume; false otherwise.
      boolean BoundingSphere.intersects(BoundingVolume otherBV)
      Returns true if the specified BoundingVolume intersects this BoundingSphere.
      boolean BoundingBox.intersects(BoundingVolume otherBV)
      Returns true if the specified BoundingVolume intersects this BoundingBox.
      abstract BoundingVolume BoundingVolume.merge(BoundingVolume otherBV)
      Returns a new BoundingVolume which is the merge of this BoundingVolume and the specified BoundingVolume.
      BoundingVolume BoundingSphere.merge(BoundingVolume otherBV)
      Returns a BoundingVolume which surrounds both this BoundingSphere and the specified BoundingVolume.
      BoundingVolume BoundingBox.merge(BoundingVolume otherBV)
      Returns a BoundingVolume which surrounds both this BoundingBox and the specified BoundingVolume.
